## biComposeMono variable

Represents the composition of two functions where they have the same argument

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
biComposeMono: <S, D, R>(aTransform: UnaryFunction<S, D>, aFct: BiFunction<D, D, R>) => BiFunction<S, S, R>
```
